g.text: Developer portal, Drupal & Content update flows
request content update as part of the devportal update
CONTENT UPDATE DEVPORTAL in DEV (optional step)
CONTENT UPDATE DEVPORTAL in STG (optional step)
request drupal update (coderepo branch provided in request)
CREATE SNAPSHOT of DEVPORTAL in PRD
manual step: submit snapshot request in vRA
manual step: verify snapshot request in vRA
